howItWorks.title: How AngoraSix works
howItWorks.subtitle: A simple process for you and your team

step1.title: Set the project rules
step1.description: We provide a simple framework to define how your project will be managed: decisions, tasks, and payments. Clear foundations for everyone from the start.
step1.imageAlt: Initial setup screen for project rules

step2.title: Connect your management tools
step2.description: We integrate with the tools your team already uses to automatically track what each member contributes.
step2.imageAlt: Integration view showing connected management tools

outcome1.title: Your team self-organizes with the platform's support
outcome1.description: AngoraSix provides a governance system based on the rules you've defined and the tracked contributions. You get full visibility into the decisions your team is making.
outcome1.imageAlt: Governance view showing voting weighted by contributions

outcome2.title: Reliable, transparent and automated payment management
outcome2.description: We connect your project to a multi-signature shared wallet that shows you exactly what each member should be paid. Review, approve with confidence, and focus on what matters.
outcome2.imageAlt: Payment distribution screen showing automated payouts by contribution
